fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Tax someone every night.
- Pay taxes to a player every night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Taxing players will roleblock them, and steal 1 charge of their night abilities, if they have any. You will know if you stole a charge
-Paying taxes gives one charge of an ability to a given player. Ex: "I'll give the charge i stole from Player Name A to Player Name F."
-You appear evil to TIs.
